detaileddescription.para: Here goes the embedded software code.
This GitHub repo posts all updates to Pivotal Tracker: https://www.pivotaltracker.com/s/projects/848197 .

para.heading: How to link a change to Pivotal Tracker

listitem.para: Go the project site on Pivotal Tracker.
Select the task which your code finishes.
In the commit message, enter [Finishes #$ID$]. Don't forget the '#'!
Push your changes to the repo.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the following verbs are also recognized by Pivotal Tracker: Delivers Fixes Completes (Finishes) .
